text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Adaptions present in the home that have been made in the context of the illness or disability to make the functioning of the patient safer and more comfortable and to enable independent living.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-LivingSituation.HomeAdaption](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-LivingSituation.HomeAdaption) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.

comment.value: This Observation resource represents the HomeAdaption concept (NL-CM:7.8.5) of zib LivingSituation. It can be used together with the [nl-core-LivingSituation](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-LivingSituation) profile on the Observation resource, which groups references to the current and other resources on `Observation.hasMember`.
